sentences.english: He would attend Cornell University in the coming august.
sentences.chinese: 今年八月他将去康乃尔大学读书。

sentences.english: The following are selected art projects completed in the Cornell-in-Rome studio.
sentences.chinese: 三件在康乃尔罗马设计课中完成的艺术创作。

sentences.english: Fuzhi Cheng is a postdoctoral fellow at Cornell University.
sentences.chinese: 成富智是康乃尔大学博士后研究员。

sentences.english: After the completion of the project, Cornell will become Asia's largest production base of aniline .
sentences.chinese: 项目建成后，康乃尔将成为亚洲最大的苯胺生产基地。

sentences.english: Kelly transferred from Cornell University to Duke University.
sentences.chinese: 凯莉从康乃尔大学转学到了杜克大学。

sentences.english: He's a scientist who runs a lab at the Monell Chemical Senses Center.
sentences.chinese: 他在蒙乃尔化学感应中心管理一个实验室。

sentences.english: Monel is also very resistant to strong caustic solutions.
sentences.chinese: 蒙乃尔对于强碱也具有很好的耐腐蚀性。

sentences.english: Abner came to you. Why did you let him go peacefully on his way?
sentences.chinese: 阿贝乃尔到你这里来，你为什么放他平安走了？

definition: Gautama, surname of the Siddhartha, the historical Buddha
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
